pitbullNumber

Class Song

  • java.lang.Object
    • pitbullNumber.Song

  • public class Song
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a Song. Each song is in an album and is sung by an artist. Each song also has a name and an ID given to it by Spotify.
    Author:
    Kieraj Mumick.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Album album
      The song's album.
      private Artist artist
      The song's artist.
      private java.lang.String id
      The song's ID, given by spotify.
      private java.lang.String name
      The song's name.

        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all the artists affiliated with a song.

      • searchForArtist

        public static Artist searchForArtist(java.lang.String searchURL)
        Searches for an artist that is mentioned in a string.
        Parameters:
        searchURL - the URL to find the search results.
        Returns:
        The first artist in the search results. If no artist was found, or an exception was thrown, returns null.
